verses.verse: God <WH430> be merciful <WH2603> unto us <WH1288>, and bless us <WH6440>; and cause his face to shine <WH215> upon us <WH5542>; Selah.
That your way <WH1870> may be known <WH3045> upon earth <WH776>, your except health <WH3444> among all nations <WH1471>.
Let the people <WH5971> praise <WH3034> you <WH430>, O God; let all the people <WH5971> praise you <WH3034>.

O let the nations <WH3816> be glad <WH8055> and sing for joy <WH7442>: for you shall judge <WH8199> the people <WH5971> righteously <WH4334>, and govern <WH5148> the nations <WH3816> upon earth <WH776>. Selah <WH5542>.
Let the people <WH5971> praise <WH3034> you <WH430>, O God; let all the people <WH5971> praise you <WH3034>.
Then shall the earth <WH776> yield <WH5414> her increase <WH2981>; and God <WH430>, even our own God <WH430>, shall bless us <WH1288>.
God <WH430> shall bless <WH1288> us <WH657>; and all the ends of the earth <WH776> shall fear him <WH3372>.
